overview: Ben (Stiaan Smith), a complacent mechanic meets Linda (Amalia Uys), a beautiful auditor who isn’t afraid to speak her mind, in a bar. As they start talking, the chemistry between them is instantly visible, but when Linda asks Ben what he does for a living he lies, by telling her he is a lead singer in a band. Not only does Ben believe Linda is out of his league, her dad is his boss.  Linda likes this charming ‘muso’, they fall in love and Ben has to start a band to cover up his lie and to win the girl of his dreams’ heart.
title: Sy Lyk Soos Lente
